file_content.text: I'll be alright. Get those sensor logs to Tython.
I know your face. The one who defeated Darth Angral. The hero of Tython.
That's "heroes" of Tython. I fought Darth Angral, too.
Jedi = hero of Tython + Coruscant + Taris + Nar Shaddaa + Alderaan + Tatooine!
My mission was a secret. No one knew where I was. How did you find me?
The spirit of my dead Master, Orgus Din, sent me here. He said you needed help.
I had a vision.
Wait a minute--was that all the weirdness back on the ship? Thanks for trusting me.
Jedi = spoke to Master Orgus? // T7 = no record of this
Thank the Force--and your Master. I thought I was dead.
First tell me about these Sith. They're like nothing I've encountered before.
What attacked you?
Abominations of the dark side. The Emperor's personal assassins.
How I found you isn't important. Why are you here?
Tell me about your mission.
Under the circumstances, I think we'd better contact my superiors. I'd almost repaired my holo before the Sith ambushed me...
Jomar? Where are you?
Masters... I completed my mission, but Sith assassins shot down my vessel over Tatooine.
The spirit of Master Orgus Din sent my rescuer. I believe you know her.
The spirit of Master Orgus Din sent my rescuer. I believe you know him.
The hero of Tython just rescued me. An impossible coincidence.
The Force wants our mission to succeed, Master Satele. This is proof.
I knew she was the nexus of our fates, but events are transpiring faster than I foresaw.
I knew he was the nexus of our fates, but events are transpiring faster than I foresaw.
We never get a break, but you can always count on me.
I'm ready to help, Master.
You foresaw this? Then tell me what's happening.
What events?
This is not the time or place for such revelations.
The galaxy is spiraling into war. Get your heads out of the Council chambers and into the fight.
Then catch up.
Patience. There is much you still don't know.
Jomar, a medical shuttle is en route. Before it arrives, give your rescuer the sensor logs you recorded.
Bring us those logs immediately. We'll explain everything when you're on Tython.
This burden is now yours. Guard it with your life. Go--hurry.
This area's dangerous. I'll stay until the medical shuttle arrives.
I won't leave you.
What I've given you cannot wait.
What's so important about these sensor logs?
What are you giving me?
I've seen the Empire's home system. Those logs reveal our enemy's defenses.
If I never return to Tatooine, it'll be too soon.
Gladly. I hate this planet.
We'll meet again on Tython. May the Force be with you.
Keep what you've witnessed here secret. Many lives depend on your discretion.
